body:
Realised that it's the 11th of October, today a year ago Jozz promoted me to Junior! :)

Any questions you want answered? Ask away, I'll try and get back to you asap :)
body_tagged:
Realised that it's the 11th of October, today a year ago Jozz promoted me to Junior! :)

Any questions you want answered? Ask away, I'll try and get back to you asap :)
